page.title: 16GOVERNMENT Parish council(1)
page.content: The{parish council of Blackboys and {Framfield}also includes Palehouse Common and Halland.The parish council is elected every four years and consists of a committee of eleven people. They meet every month of the year between 7.30-9.30 p.m. except August and September when members may be on holiday. The parish council serves a population of 1800 people. The chairman of the parish council for the last few years has been Mr.John Dann who has been a parish councillor for 25 years.His role is to ensure fair debate and to represent the parish council. There is a clerk to the parish council who deals with the secretarial work. The work of the parish council involves many different local issues from street lighting to bus shelters and advising the district and county councils on local matters.
